programme.title: Boogeyman 3
Boogeyman 3
programme.desc:
Boogeyman 3: Directed by Gary Jones. With Erin Cahill, Charles Hittinger, Mimi Michaels, Matt Rippy. When a college student witnesses the alleged suicide of her roommate, it sets into motion a series of horrific events that cause her to fear the supernatural entity. As she tries to convince the rest of her dorm that the Boogeyman does exist, the evil force grows stronger and her friends begin to pay the price. Now she must stop this ultimate evil before the entire campus falls prey." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1204883/","name":"Boogeyman 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk0NDgyMzMtNDFiNS00Yjc5LWExY2ItMWQ2Y2NjMWM0NTM1L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a college student witnesses the alleged suicide of her roommate, it sets into motion a series of horrific events that cause her to fear the supernatural entity. As she tries to convince the rest of her dorm that the Boogeyman do","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1204883/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Platypuschow"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Boogeyman 3: The best of the trilogy","reviewBody":"I hated the first two films, I thought they were simply horror done wrong with no originality at all. Cookie cutter horror and done badly, really really badly.

The third was expected to be just as bad but was a pleasant surprise, it's still mediocre but its passable by comparison.

This time the film actually has a structure, a competent plot and the "Boogeyman" isn't bad at all in appearance/execution.

It follows a tried and tested formula, kids in uni getting picked off one by one by this malevolent force but the "Belief" system makes for some interesting scenarios.

The deaths are average, the script is passable and the movie as a whole is nothing even remotely special but compared to the first two this is a work of art.

Just about watchable stuff and certainly ending the trilogy on a high....ish note.

The Good:

Boogeyman looks great

Has a few very inventive ideas

A couple of the girls on the cast were great

The Bad:

Potential was squandered

Still very generic

Things I Learnt From This Movie:

That girl from Coronation Street & Hollyoaks doesn't know how to age! Seriously, she has access to the fountain of eternal youth and I demand a pint or two....or three...or a weekend of bathing in it! I'm approaching 40 leave me alone!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4773,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-01-20","keywords":"playing fetch with a dog,closet,monster under bed,bloody hand,voice over journal","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Boogeyman 3: DVD Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi767886105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5MzgzNzMwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjUwNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5MzgzNzMwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjUwNTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When college sophomore Sarah Morris witnesses the alleged suicide of her best friend, it sets into motion a series of horrific events that cause Sarah to fear the supernatural entity known as the Boogeyman. Izvanzemaljac
programme.desc:
Extraterrestrial: Directed by Colin Minihan. With Brittany Allen, Freddie Stroma, Melanie Papalia, Jesse Moss. A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2960930/","name":"Extraterrestrial","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MjUwNzQ3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk2NTY3MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2960930/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"subxerogravity"},"dateCreated":"2015-05-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Run of the mill Horror movie.","reviewBody":"At least it was not another bad found footage genre film which it looked like it was about to become. 

April is a girl assigned by her mom to take some pictures of their cabin lake property for real estate purposes and ends up leading her and her friends into an alien invasion.

The CGI aliens were kinda scary, but they leave noting to the imagination. Nothing unique at all about this movie as a matter of fact. The hot young teens could not be more stereotyped and formulated. It was easy to guess what was coming next. 

Although, replacing the slashing moments with alien abductions was a step in the right direction, but does not make the movie.

If you catch it catch, but not worth going out of the way to see it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15347,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-10-17","keywords":"alien abduction,no survivors,videotape,vietnam war veteran,military cover up","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi377794329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMyNzM4OTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgxNDE4MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODMyNzM4OTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgxNDE4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of friends on a weekend trip to a cabin in the woods find themselves terrorized by alien visitors.
